dashboard.title: Member Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your services and billing.
dashboard.description: Manage your K2NET subscription and monitor service status.
dashboard.incident_desc: We've identified an issue affecting your area: {title}
dashboard.upgrade_desc: Upgrade your plan to enjoy faster connection and higher priority support.
dashboard.success_pay: Thank you! Your payment has been processed.
dashboard.success_upgrade: Upgrade request submitted! Our team will contact you soon.
dashboard.troubleshoot_desc: Facing slow connection or no internet? Run a quick connectivity scan.

diagnostics.title: Network Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Run a comprehensive check on your internet connection to identify potential issues.
diagnostics.healthy_desc: We didn't find any issues with your connection. If you're still facing problems, please contact support.
diagnostics.did_you_know: Restarting your router solves 90% of connectivity issues by clearing temporary cache and refreshing the IP assignment.

invoices.title: My Invoices
invoices.subtitle: View your payment history and download invoice receipts.
invoices.download_desc: Your invoice receipt is being generated.

usage.title: Usage Analytics
usage.subtitle: Monitor your data consumption and bandwidth trends.
usage.need_speed_desc: You're approaching 80% of your peak bandwidth during evening hours. Consider upgrading your plan for a smoother experience.
usage.throttled_notice: Your speed is currently limited (FUP active).

profile.title: Customer Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information and account security.
